titlestmt.sponsor: This collection-level EAD record is a product of the Philadelphia Area Consortium of Special Collections Libraries (PACSCL) Consortial Survey Initiative, which was funded by the Andrew W. Mellon Foundation.

profiledesc.creation: Machine-readable finding aid generated in EAD from data in the PACSCL Consortial Survey Database on 12/21/2012. Modified by Dot Porter in 2017.

bioghist.p: Donald E. Robinson served in World War II on the USS Bennington. His rank was mailman third class.

scopecontent.p: Papers of Donald E. Robinson related to his service in the US Navy career of Donald E. Robinson on the USS Bennington. Materials include; letters to his parents; letters to Robinson from family, friends, and fellow church members; several issues of Bennington newsletters, including The Busy B; "Ben-Trav-Log" form letters; ID cards and travel passes; a plank owner certificate; maps of Bennington's movements; a printed pictorial history of Bennington; certificates; a "serviceman's address book"; pamphlets and menu from the commissioning of Bennington; church service programs; photographs taken on board Bennington, including photos of Robinson; and application materials for a veteran's bonus. [not in box with collection: 2 photos of Warner Company tugs, and photos of other vessels.]

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.
